name: The Last of Us NES version
name_original: The Last of Us NES version
description:
THE LAST OF US NES version -By La Espiral Oscura-

A Cordyceps pandemic has devastated the human population. Joel,  a survivor who doesn't know anything. He has an important mission. He has to lead Ellie, his clever companion, in search of the Fireflies, a resistance group that promises to create the cure.

Controls

The game plays with keyboard.

  • Move: A and D 
  • Jump: W / Space
  • Shoot: J 
  • Action: K
Credits

Made with Construct 3 r234.4. All design, code, graphics and music by me.

Game based on the original work of "Naughty Dog"

Music based on the original work of Gustavo Santaolalla.

This project was created as part of a game jam and is still in early development.

Feel free to give feedback & please let me know if you find any bugs or glitches.

THANKS FOR PLAYING!
